data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Thomson, Robin E., Holzenthal, Ralph W. (2015): A revision of the Neotropical caddisfly genus Leucotrichia Mosely, 1934 (Hydroptilidae, Leucotrichiinae). ZooKeys 499: 1-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.499.8360, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.499.8360
